price: Katakanlah, "Terangkanlah kepadaku, jika Allah menjadikan untukmu malam itu terus-menerus sampai hari kiamat, siapakah Tuhan selain Allah yang akan mendatangkan sinar terang kepadamu? Maka apakah kamu tidak mendengar?"
arabic: قُلۡ أَرَءَيۡتُمۡ إِن جَعَلَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَيۡكُمُ ٱلَّيۡلَ سَرۡمَدًا إِلَىٰ يَوۡمِ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِ مَنۡ إِلَٰهٌ غَيۡرُ ٱللَّهِ يَأۡتِيكُم بِضِيَآءٍۚ أَفَلَا تَسۡمَعُونَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: qul ara-aytum in jaʿala al-lahu ʿalaykumu al-layla sarmadan ilā yawmi al-qiyāmati man ilāhun ghayru al-lahi yatīkum biḍiyāin afalā tasmaʿūna
